SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am11
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am11.network.connector

Interface ClientGameConnector

All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientConnectorImpl, ClientGameSender
public interface ClientGameConnector
The UI uses this interface to send commands to the server

To get this connector, the UI should call the getConnector method of the ClientNetworkHandler. Each network implementation will provide an implementation of this interface.

See Also:
  • ClientConnectorImpl
  • ClientGameSender

  • Method Details

    • setStarterCard

      void setStarterCard (boolean isRetro)
      Sends a command to the server to place the starter card onto the field on the specified position
      Parameters:
      isRetro - true if the card is placed face down, false otherwise

    • setPersonalObjective

      void setPersonalObjective (int cardId)
      Sends a command to the server to place choose a personal objective card
      Parameters:
      cardId - the id of the card to choose

    • placeCard

      void placeCard (@NotNull @NotNull Position pos, int cardId, boolean isRetro)
      Sends a command to the server to place a card onto the field on the specified position and orientation
      Parameters:
      pos - the position where to place the card
      cardId - the id of the card to place
      isRetro - true if the card is placed face down, false otherwise

    • drawCard

      void drawCard (boolean fromVisible, @NotNull @NotNull PlayableCardType type, int cardId)
      Sends a command to the server to draw a card from the table
      Parameters:
      fromVisible - true if the card is drawn from the visible cards, false otherwise
      type - the type of the card to draw
      cardId - the id of the card to drawn, ignored if the card is drawn from the visible decks

    • setNumOfPlayers

      void setNumOfPlayers (int numOfPlayers)
      Used by the godPlayer to specify the number of players in the game
      Parameters:
      numOfPlayers - the number of players that will play the game

    • setNickname

      void setNickname (@NotNull @NotNull String nickname)
      Used to send to the server the chosen nickname
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname chosen by the player

    • syncMeUp

      void syncMeUp()
      Used in case the client model has discrepancies with the server model. It is a request to receive the complete game state from the server
